title: [Fanfare shorts]
brief_description: A showreel anthology of animated advertisements and public service films from the early to mid 1960’s. Zippy and sophisticated animation at the service of commerce and public education. These cartoons provide a facinating insight into the social and cultural mores of ‘60’s Australia.
